author: assaf
msg: Fixed appearance of over due items.

author: assaf
msg: Switched to tabular view for tasks list (also completed, following).
Provides more concise task list, more information in less space.

author: assaf
msg: Added form_perform_url and form_view_url, both of which are optional (not all tasks have forms).
Added form_completing which decides whether form completes task, or we need to include a button to mark task as completed.
